references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of counterfactual harm, which is the core focus of the current research paper.
This paper provides a causal framework for analyzing harm, which is used to characterize counterfactual harm in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Designing decision support systems using counterfactual prediction sets
references.reason: This is another paper by the same authors that lays the groundwork for the methodological approach used in the main paper.
This paper introduces a computational framework for controlling risk, which is used to design decision support systems in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Causal inference in statistics: An overview
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational overview of causal inference, which is heavily used in the theoretical development of the main paper.
